title: How to Film Skateboarding with Ewan Bowman - Converse CONS Project
description:
This is a four part series for Cons Project, providing a DIY lesson on how to film a skate video. Four films will show you tips on skate filming including editing techniques, follow filming, shot composition, and skating in front of the camera with experts Mike Gilbert, Ewan Bowman, Nick Genova, and Don “Nuge” Nguyen.

Directed by Jon Holland
